song.title: If you but knew
song.lyrics:
[C] If you but knew all that God gives, You would be asking for water from me. I am your God, source of your life. Come now and rest on my heart.
[V1] I am the God who has made you. I shaped you and formed you in your motherâ€™s womb. I give you all what you need For each day of your life. There is no need to fear.
[V2] If you should pass through deep waters, Encountering death, I will always be there. You are my chosen one, Israel. I take you by the hand. I am with you.
[V3] I am the God of your Fathers, the Saviour, Creator of all that was made. I set the stars in the heavens, Established the universe. I am your God.
[V4] I march in front of you, challenge the mighty And throw down their high city walls. I break the chains that have bound you. I level the mountains and trace you a path.
[V5] I open to you the treasures that come from my kingdom, Unknown to the wise. People of Israel, worship me humbly, Acknowledge that I am your God.
